DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to assess the long term safety of Eculizumab in hemolytic PNH patients who completed the 4 weeks screening and 12 weeks treatment period of C07-001 study. In addition, pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic assessments of Eculizumab will be conducted.
DOC.brief_title: E07-001: Safety and Efficacy Extension Study of Eculizumab in Paroxysmal Nocturnal Hemoglobinuria Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients must have fully completed C07001 study 12week treatment period Patients who terminated early from the C07001 study
